params.parametrs: Struct containing the parameters for the new vesting schedule.

params._to: Address to receive the withdrawn tokens.

claim().notice: Claims all tokens currently available for the caller according to their vesting schedule.

claimableAmount(address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens that can currently be claimed by a beneficiary.

getInitData(address,address,address).notice: Returns the ABI-encoded initialization data for the contract.

startVesting((address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Creates a new vesting schedule for a beneficiary.

vestedAmount(address).notice: Returns the total amount of tokens vested for a beneficiary at the current time.

withdrawUnallocated(address).notice: Withdraws all unallocated tokens from the contract to the specified address.
